trans-unit.source: Separation of Node and Configuration IDs
trans-unit.target: 隔離節點和設定識別碼

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概觀

trans-unit.source: In order to provide a more flexible and streamlined experience when using DSC in Pull mode, we have added a number of features in this release.
trans-unit.target: 為了在 Pull 模式中使用 DSC 時提供更有彈性且有效率的體驗，我們在此版本中加入了多種功能。

trans-unit.source: These features are intended to allow you to have the flexibility to easily setup and deploy configurations across multiple nodes, while still tracking status and reporting information for each node individually.
trans-unit.target: 這些功能可讓您更有彈性地輕鬆設定及部署跨多個節點的設定，同時仍然可以個別追蹤每個節點的狀態及報告資訊。

trans-unit.source: These features are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這些功能如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: A configuration name which identifies the configuration for a computer.
trans-unit.target: 用來識別電腦設定的設定名稱。

trans-unit.source: This name can be shared by multiple target nodes
trans-unit.target: 此名稱可由多個目標節點共用

trans-unit.source: An agent ID which uniquely identifies a single node
trans-unit.target: 可唯一識別單一節點的代理程式識別碼

trans-unit.source: A registration step which only occurs the first time a target node connects to a pull server
trans-unit.target: 只在目標節點第一次連線到提取伺服器時發生的註冊步驟

trans-unit.source: **Note:** These features and functionality have been added and do not replace the existing pull features and concepts.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**這些功能已經加入，而且不會取代現有的提取功能和概念。

trans-unit.source: You can use these new features or the older ones with the new pull server shipping in this release.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些新功能或具有此版本中發送之新提取伺服器的舊功能。

trans-unit.source: Agent ID
trans-unit.target: 代理程式識別碼

trans-unit.source: This feature is for users who do not want to setup and manage unique identifiers for each target node.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能是提供給不想設定及管理每個目標節點唯一識別碼的使用者使用。

trans-unit.source: Now, there is no more bookkeeping of GUIDs required.
trans-unit.target: 現在，再也不需要對所需的 GUID 進行記錄。

trans-unit.source: DSC automatically generates an agent ID that it uses when communicating with the pull server.
trans-unit.target: DSC 會自動產生與提取伺服器通訊時，會使用代理程式識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This ID is used by the pull server to uniquely identify all information with a given node.
trans-unit.target: 此識別碼由提取伺服器使用，用於唯一識別指定節點的所有資訊。

trans-unit.source: It also means that you do not need to set up each target node with a unique meta-configuation containing a unique ID so a single meta-configuation can be used by many target nodes while still retaining each node's unique identity.
trans-unit.target: 這也代表您不需要使用包含唯一識別碼的唯一中繼設定來設定每個目標節點，因此單一中繼設定可供許多目標節點使用，同時仍然保留每個節點的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: Configuration name
trans-unit.target: 設定名稱

trans-unit.source: The configuration name is a friendly name that defines that name of the configuration that a target node will apply.
trans-unit.target: 設定名稱是易記的名稱，用來定義目標節點會套用的設定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The changes associated to this are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 與此相關聯的變更如下︰

trans-unit.source: Friendly naming
trans-unit.target: 易記的命名

trans-unit.source: This can be any string!
trans-unit.target: 可以使用任何字串！

trans-unit.source: It does not need to be in the format of a GUID so a configuration that sets up SQL server can simply be named 'SQL_Server'.
trans-unit.target: 不需要是 GUID 的格式，所以設定 SQL server 的設定可簡單的命名為 'SQL_Server'。

trans-unit.source: This makes it much easier to identify what a given configuration does.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您更容易識別指定設定的用途。

trans-unit.source: Assignment
trans-unit.target: 工作分派

trans-unit.source: The configuration that a target node is assigned is centrally managed on the pull server.
trans-unit.target: 在提取伺服器上集中管理有指派目標節點的設定。

trans-unit.source: This can be bootstrapped by defining the ConfigrationName property in the meta-configuration but this is only used during registration.
trans-unit.target: 這可以藉由定義中繼設定中的 ConfigrationName 屬性來啟動，但這只適用於登錄期間。

trans-unit.source: After registration, the server tells the target node what configuration it will get.
trans-unit.target: 登錄後，伺服器會告訴目標節點它會取得的設定。

trans-unit.source: For the on-premises pull server this mapping between configurations and target nodes can only be done during registration, but in Azure Automation these changes can be made easily in the UI or through their cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 對內部部署提取伺服器來說，設定和目標節點之間的對應只能夠在登錄期間執行，但在 Azure 自動化中，這些變更可輕鬆地在 UI 內或透過其 Cmdlet 執行。

trans-unit.source: To change the configuration assigned to a target node for the on-premises pull server you can re-run registration.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更指派給目標節點的內部提取伺服器設定，您可以重新執行登錄。

trans-unit.source: Multiple/Partial configurations
trans-unit.target: 多個/部分設定

trans-unit.source: If multiple configuration names are assigned to a target node, they will be treated like partial configurations.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個設定名稱指派給目標節點時，它們會被視為部分設定。

trans-unit.source: In order for this to work, the meta-configuration on the target node must be configured to accept the partial configurations.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓此步驟能正常運作，目標節點上的中繼設定必須設定為接受部分設定。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This is only supported on the on-premises pull server.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**這僅在內部部署提取伺服器上支援。

trans-unit.source: Azure Automation does not support partial configurations.
trans-unit.target: Azure 自動化不支援部分設定。

trans-unit.source: Registration
trans-unit.target: 註冊

trans-unit.source: Because configuration names are no longer GUIDs (they are now friendly names), anyone can guess them.
trans-unit.target: 因為設定名稱不再是 GUID (它們現在是易記的名稱)，任何人都可以猜出它們。

trans-unit.source: To mitigate the inherent security issue with this, we added a registration step before a node can start requesting configurations from a server.
trans-unit.target: 為了減輕這固有的安全性問題，我們在節點可以從伺服器要求設定之前，加入了註冊的步驟。

trans-unit.source: A node registers itself with the pull server with a shared secret (which the node and the server both know already), and, optionally, the name of the configuration it will request.
trans-unit.target: 節點使用共用密碼 (節點和伺服器皆知道密碼) 向提取伺服器進行註冊，而且 (選擇性的) 註冊將要求的設定名稱。

trans-unit.source: This shared secret doesn't have to be unique for each computer.
trans-unit.target: 此共用密碼在每一部電腦上不需要是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Assumption: the shared secret is a hard-to-guess identifier, like a GUID.
trans-unit.target: 假設︰共用密碼是難以猜測的識別碼，就像 GUID。

trans-unit.source: This shared secret is defined by the **RegistrationKey** property in the target node's meta-configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此共用的密碼由目標節點中繼設定中的 **RegistrationKey** 屬性所定義。

trans-unit.source: Example meta-configuration
trans-unit.target: 中繼設定範例

trans-unit.source: The RegistrationKey value must be defined by on the pull server.
trans-unit.target: RegistrationKey 值必須在提取伺服器上定義。

trans-unit.source: In order to do this while setting up the pull server, create a text file with the name **RegistrationKeys.txt** in a specific location, and then set this location in the web.config of the pull server, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 為了設定提取伺服器時執行此步驟，請在特定位置建立一個名稱為 **RegistrationKeys.txt** 的文字檔案，然後在提取伺服器的 web.config 中設定此位置，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Use the latest version of the xDSCWebService DSC resource to fully deploy an on-premises pull server for use with this.
trans-unit.target: 使用 xDSCWebService DSC 資源的最新版本，完全部署內部部署提取伺服器，以與此搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: See [Example Configuration](https://github.com/grayzu/PSSummitEU2015/blob/master/PullServer/02%20-%20PullServer%20Config.ps1) for a complete configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如須完成設定的相關資訊，請參閱 [Example Configuration](https://github.com/grayzu/PSSummitEU2015/blob/master/PullServer/02%20-%20PullServer%20Config.ps1)。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This feature is not supported when the pull server is set up to be a file share.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**提取伺服器設定為檔案共用時，不支援此功能。

trans-unit.source: It is only supported for the web-based pull server.
trans-unit.target: 只支援網頁導向提取伺服器。
